text.p: Game Financial Corp said on Wednesday it failed to renew a deal under which it provides credit card cash advances, check cashing and other services to customers at a Louisiana Casino until 1997, but succeeded at renewing a similar deal with a Mississipppi casino.

Game Financial said it also has received new contracts to provide some services at five properties in Nevada, South Dakota and Colorado. Altogether, Game Financial said it operates in 68 locations, up from 28 at the end of 1995 and now has agreements with seven additional gaming establishments that will become operational in the fourth quarter of 1996.
